name: Extreme Tennis
description:
Drag your ball backward and charge it to make a perfect shot! Charged shot, teleportation ability（or instant movement ability）, and 1 v 1 online battle... Extreme Tennis isn't the same thing you ever got and it will bring you ultimate fun! Winning trophies to unlock stages and characters now! All courses will feast your eyes!

Game features:
- 2 players online tennis game
-Unique gameplay: charged shot
-Charge your ball and make a more powerful shot!
-A perfect combination of sports and relaxation
-Awesome shooting and astonishing teleportation ability
-Various characters and fantastic tennis courts
Be sure to join Extreme Tennis if you love tennis! This fun multiplayer tennis online game will not let you down. Now, let us start our tennis journey with friends from all over the world!
